item.description:
For those who are at the Common Ground Country Fair on Saturday, feel free to take a rest and hang out with some fellow permaculture people in the later afternoon. Â Last year a few of us quasi-accidentally gathered in the vicinity of blacksmith shop and the Maine Folk Traditions Tent (near the Maine Guide Camp) and hung out while the kids played and we chatted about some of the sessions we had attended and permaculture-y things in general.

Drop by any time from 3:00 to 4:30!
item.how_to_find_us: On the lawn between the Blacksmith Shop and the Maine Folk Traditions Tent

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Pop-up Permie Gathering at the Fair
